org.needle4j.junit

Class NeedleRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.needle4j.NeedleTestcase
      • org.needle4j.junit.NeedleRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.MethodRule

    public class NeedleRule
extends NeedleTestcase
implements org.junit.rules.MethodRule
    JUnit MethodRule for the initialization of the test. The Rule processes and initializes all fields annotated with ObjectUnderTest. 
     Example:
 
 public class UserDaoBeanTest {
 
        @Rule
        public NeedleRule needle = new NeedleRule();
 
        @ObjectUnderTest
        private UserDaoBean userDao;
 
        @Test
        public void test() {
         ...
         userDao.someAction();
         ...
        }
 }
    See Also:
    NeedleTestcase
